title: Inner Space
description: How well do you know your best friend? How would you react if he was suddenly arrested for murder? At 45 years of age with a broken, childless marriage behind him, Detective Inspector Nick Burton is just coasting through life. That is until the day his boss, Chief Superintendent Dan Davies, is arrested and charged with murder. In denial Nick's attempts to get at the truth are further hampered when Dan dies while in custody. Question did he commit suicide to avoid prosecution and imprisonment? Or was he murdered to prevent a scandal?
author: Merlin Fraser
